thread.title: BRIEF-Twin Rivers Paper Co To Acquire Pine Bluff, Arkansas Paper Mill From Mondi

title: BRIEF-Twin Rivers Paper Co To Acquire Pine Bluff, Arkansas Paper Mill From Mondi

organizations.name: brief-twin rivers paper co to acquire pine bluff
kansas paper mill from mondi reuters

text:
April 4, 2018 / 3:06 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Twin Rivers Paper Co To Acquire Pine Bluff, Arkansas Paper Mill From Mondi Reuters Staff 
April 4 (Reuters) - ‍Twin Rivers Paper Co: 
* TWIN RIVERS PAPER ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE PINE BLUFF, ARKANSAS PAPER MILL FROM MONDI GROUP 
* ACQUISITION OF PAPER MILL FROM MONDI IS ANTICIPATED TO BE COMPLETED IN Q2 2018, TERMS OF DEAL WERE NOT DISCLOSED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
